Short Description: Value used, only for the AMR code, to determine the number of decimals present in the Option contract strike price, as the strike price is disseminated in format of an integer.
Indicates allowed MM Protection type on the contract. (0: Disabled; 1: Enabled)

Values: 1 Traded as an outright, 2 Not traded, but listed in contract data. Traders may subscribe to it, 3 Traded as a simple inter-commodity spread, 4 Traded as an inter-commodity spread

Short Description: Unit in which the instrument is quoted.
Defined the underlying sub-type associated to the underlying type.
ISIN Code of the index underlying of the TRF contract.
Default Tick Size value applicable for all Settlement Prices. It's calculated using the PriceDecimals.
Specific Tick Size value applicable for EDSP. It's calculated using the PriceDecimals.
Identifies the Symbol Index of the underlying of the instrument.
Trading Policy enabling to allocate a given incoming volume to orders.
Values: 1 Price Explicit Time, 2 Price Pro Rata

Short Description: ID of the Reference Spread Table.
Type of synthetic quote applied to the contract
Values: 0 No Synthetic Quote, 1 Spontaneous Implied Matching, 2 Event Driven Implied Matching

Short Description: Amount of underlying instrument per unit of a derivative contract (to be calculated with the Quantity Decimals). Due to corporate actions, the value may be different between value provided within this field in Contract Standing Data and Outright Standing Data. Value in Outright Standing Data reflects the adjustment due to the corporate action and should be used for that Outright instrument.
